text:
Porfiry's Introduction

Cheerful gathering; Raskolnikov feels uneasy.  
“What does this mean?” thought Raskolnikov.  
“Meet my friend Raskolnikov!” Porfiry exclaimed.  

---

Casual atmosphere; Zametov looks surprised.  
“Why, we met at your place yesterday.”  
“Ah, saved me the trouble!” Porfiry chuckled.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov is introduced to Porfiry Petrovitch, indicating he has a business matter to discuss.
